column1: * 1914 - Robert Gilson is the first of the T.C.B.S. to join the World War I. He enlists with the wikipedia:Cambridgeshire Regiment as a wikipedia:Second Lieutenant.
* 1930 - Father Christmas writes a Letters from Father Christmas to J.R.R. Tolkiens children.
* 1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to George Sayer (28 November 1963).
* 1964 - The eighth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
